Save up to 22% on product categories and get FREE Standard Shipping*! —Minimum 7% discount!—
We are excited to announce our new offer with Grainger. As an existing Grainger account holder, your account has already been linked to the TruckersB2B National Account Program. You don't have to do anything except continue purchasing the way you normally do. You will automatically receive the discounted pricing and FREE standard shipping* on all of your orders with Grainger! TruckersB2B members are already saving up to 22% on product categories.
Top End Discounts
Hand & Power Tools: 50% off manufacturer list price on brands like Milwaukee, Proto, & others Motors: 17% discount off catalog pricing on over 10,000 motors HVAC: 18% off catalog pricing on over 15,000 products
Additional FREE Services
Inventory management Lighting audits Safety training Sustainability Emergency preparedness
Login to your Grainger account online to see your discounted pricing.
Don't see the changes to your account? Contact Daniel Pramis at 603-628-2333
If you are already on another Grainger National Account Program, please reach out to your account representative and request to have your account linked to the TruckersB2B program.
Learn more at truckersb2b.com/grainger or call 603-628-2333
*extra charges will be incurred for additional services, such as expedited delivery or special handling by the carrier
